studyspace.title: StudySpace
studyspace.description: Collaborative study platform with real-time tools and organized workspaces.
studyspace.longDescription: A comprehensive collaborative study platform designed for students. Features organized workspaces, timed study sessions with auto-save, integrated whiteboard and note-taking tools. Built to replace fragmented toolsets (Discord + Google Docs) with a unified, distraction-free environment.

akiba-hub.title: AkibaHub
akiba-hub.description: Economic intelligence platform for the Ivorian agri-food sector (Private Enterprise Project)
akiba-hub.longDescription: A comprehensive economic intelligence platform designed for the Ivorian agri-food sector. As a Private Enterprise Project, source code is not available. The system combines automated data collection from external APIs (like FAOSTAT) with dynamic visualization of economic indicators, serving as a strategic decision-support tool.
highlights: Real-time KPI dashboards and alert systems

xpense.title: Xpense
xpense.description: Real-time expense tracking with intelligent categorization
xpense.longDescription: A comprehensive expense management solution built with ReactJS and Firebase. Features real-time synchronization across devices, automated expense categorization, and insightful financial analytics.
highlights: Real-time data synchronization with Firebase Realtime Database
Chatbot as a financial assistant to answer user questions

ace-app.title: ACE_APP
ace-app.description: Smart attendance management for educational institutions
ace-app.longDescription: A mobile-first attendance tracking solution designed for schools and universities. Built with Flutter for cross-platform deployment, featuring offline support and intelligent reporting.
highlights: Cross-platform iOS and Android support with Flutter
Offline-first architecture with local SQLite storage

industry-4.title: Industry 4.0 - Livestock AI
industry-4.description: AI-driven livestock optimization for sustainable farming
industry-4.longDescription: An innovative AI solution for livestock management that leverages machine learning to optimize feeding schedules, health monitoring, and resource allocation for sustainable farming practices.
highlights: Led a team of 4 developers in agile methodology
Implemented predictive models for livestock health monitoring
Reduced resource waste by 30% through optimized scheduling

e-docs.title: E-Docs
e-docs.description: Digital library and documentation management system
e-docs.longDescription: A modern documentation platform designed for educational institutions, featuring advanced search capabilities, version control, and collaborative editing features.

networking-lab.title: Networking Lab - DHCPv4 & SLAAC IPv6
networking-lab.description: Comparative analysis of IPv4 and IPv6 addressing mechanisms
networking-lab.longDescription: A comprehensive networking lab simulating and comparing stateful DHCPv4 and stateless SLAAC IPv6 mechanisms in a virtualized environment. Features deep packet analysis to observe protocol transitions and security implications.
highlights: Simulated DHCPv4 Stateful and SLAAC IPv6 Stateless mechanisms
Deep packet analysis with Wireshark and tshark
Analyzed transition from ARP to Neighbor Discovery Protocol (NDP)
Documented IPv6 Privacy Extensions and Multicast transitions
